channel.title: Dragon claws help please!
channel.description:
Ok i have read every single tutorial on dragon claws they all require special.java WHICH MY SERVER DOES NOT HAVE!!!
dont call me a noob and tell me to use search bar i have read nearly every tutorial there is about claws or special.java
im using the source demolishscapev6 and it has dragon claws special BUT ITS USING THE DRAGON DAGGER EMOTE AND HITTING THE SAME only twice, people are bichin at me because it doesnt hit 4 times and im not sure how to fix it PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME if you can help i will give co owner on my server
Thanks in advanced

item.title: Dragon claws help please!

item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Once Again, what is the point of adding special.java, if you alreaddy have a fucking file with the methods and ints that ‘special.java’ would have, if you were using a base with the name of ‘special.java’

Ooooh, so hard to rename

to

itemID..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 12:18:49 am[/size][hr]

	if(playerName.startsWith("Anfernio")) {
	System.out.prinln("DickSize: " + dickSize[3])
	System.out.println("Computer Hours: " + hoursOnTheComputer[5]);

item.title: Dragon claws help please!
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Lmao, why would you create a duplicate of an existing class?

If you have a class that has the methods and ints needed for a ‘special.java’, buts just named… attacks.java

Why would you create a special.java file, just to follow a simple tutorial?

A little bit of renaming is good for the mind.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon claws help please!
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:4, topic:292380”]Every base has different file names.

Find the special.java on your server (even if it is by a different name)

As for weapons hitting weirdly.

if(id == DClawCode) { return 2075; }

Edit that to make them hit differently[/quote]

Not that hard to do

class Special {
}
